me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.command

Interface PermissionConstrainable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PermissionConstrainedCommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SubCommand

    public interface PermissionConstrainable
    Represents an item that can be restricted via permissions.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasAccess(CommandSender sender)
      Determines if the specified player has access to use this item.

    • Method Detail

      • hasAccess

        boolean hasAccess(CommandSender sender)
        Determines if the specified player has access to use this item. Implementations of this method should return false if, for example, the sender is not a player but must be for the command to succeed.
        Parameters:
        sender - The player (or command executor) of whom to check permissions.
        Returns:
        true if the specified player has access to this command, false otherwise.
